mods.abstract: A RUNAWAY IN JAIL. WAS committed into the Prison of the Parish of St. Landry, on the 18th of November instant, a negroman calling himself Nathan, and saying he belongs to Mr. Alfred Brown, of Williamsport. This boy is about 52 years of age, black, 5 feet 10 inches high, he wears whiskers, speaks English only. The owner is requested to come forward, prove property, pay charges, and take him away otherwise he will be disposed of according to law. CHS. THOMPSON, Jailor. Opelousas, November 26th, 1853.
